0xAC3A74E8384A9919.name: SET_WIND
0xAC3A74E8384A9919.comment: Sets the the normalized wind speed value. The wind speed clamps always at 12.0, SET_WIND sets the wind in a percentage, 0.0 is 0 and 1.0 is 12.0. Setting this value to a negative number resumes the random wind speed changes provided by the game.
